Joffre Lamar Stewart (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 Eprel 1925 ruo ụbọchị 12 Machị 2019) bụ onye America na-ede uri, onye anarchist, na onye na-eme udo nke a maara maka itinye aka na mmalite mmalite Beat movement. Stewart bi na Chicago; a kpọtụrụ ya aha na uri Allen Ginsberg nke afọ 1955 "Howl".
Akwụkwọ Stewart bụ Poems and Poetry ka Every Now and Then Publishing Cooperative bipụtara n'afọ 1982
